item.title: Installing Hugo
item.author: philipp.westphal@gmx.net (Philipp Westphal)
item.description: Source: Hugo > Getting Started > Installing This web site is generated by Hugo. Installing Hugo on Linux is as simple as dowloading a binary in a tarball, extracting it and make it available on the searchpath ($PATH). item.title: Ostpoller Meta
item.author: philipp.westphal@gmx.net (Philipp Westphal)
item.description: In the past I have used several systems to keep notes for my references. I ended up in a mess because I generated and kept notes in various ways for my private projects as well as for my work projects - often overlapping, often in systems that could not easily exchange data. Further, the company I work for does not allow data-synchronization between systems we use at work and our private devices regardless whether the data is classified or not.
item.dc:creator: Philipp Westphal
